attributes.name: duration
attributes.description:
Number of miliseconds before hiding the notification
Default:  2000

attributes.name: ripple
attributes.description:
Whether to show the notification with a ripple effect
Default:  true

attributes.name: position
attributes.description:
Viewport location where notifications are rendered
Default:  {x:'right',y:'bottom'}

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description:
Any component that emits events should not do so if it is disabled.
Note that this is not enforced, but the disabled property is made available.
Users of this mix-in should ensure not to call "de" if this property is set to true.

properties.name: duration
properties.description:
Number of miliseconds before hiding the notification
Default:  2000

properties.name: ripple
properties.description:
Whether to show the notification with a ripple effect
Default:  true

properties.name: position
properties.description:
Viewport location where notifications are rendered
Default:  {x:'right',y:'bottom'}

properties.name: types
properties.description: Array with individual configurations for each type of toast

properties.name: evCount
properties.description: Tracks how many times each event type was called.

properties.name: disabled
properties.description:
Any component that emits events should not do so if it is disabled.
Note that this is not enforced, but the disabled property is made available.
Users of this mix-in should ensure not to call "de" if this property is set to true.
